document_data.mainbody: roalaunt was a Thayan cursed by Samaerra, an apprentice of Larloch, to become a boar after he became too familiar with her at a Magefair. He had to achieve a series of unbindings by performing great tasks such as eating thirteen rabid chipmunks, and kissing the Simbul, among others. As a boar he was known as Warpig, and his companion was a half-orc named Orokh.
